original_title: Universal Ike in the Neglected Wife
overview: Louise and Ray are newly married. At heart Ray is in love with Louise, though he is a bit of a flirt. Resentful, because of his neglect, Louise writes her parents that she is coming home. She learns that Ray is infatuated with his stenographer, and hires a detective to trail him.
title: Universal Ike in the Neglected Wife
